scripts.native: yarn build && cd apps/expo && yarn start
scripts.web: yarn build && cd apps/next && yarn next
scripts.build: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude next-app --exclude sb-react --exclude vite -pi run build
scripts.build:web: yarn turbo run build --filter=next-app && yarn turbo run start --filter=next-app
scripts.upgrade:tamagui: manypkg upgrade tamagui && manypkg upgrade @tamagui && manypkg upgrade tamagui-loader && manypkg upgrade react-native-web-lite && manypkg upgrade tamagui-phosphor-icons
scripts.upgrade:next: manypkg upgrade next && manypkg upgrade eslint-config-next
scripts.tests: yarn build && cd apps/tests && yarn test
scripts.rm:nodemodule: rm -rf node_modules apps/expo/node_modules apps/next/node_modules packages/ui/node_modules yarn.lock apps/storybook-react/node_modules apps/storybook-react-native/node_modules apps/storybook-react/dist
